title: Design Group Kids Paint Set - 12 Watercolour Paints & brush Set, Washable Colors, Brushes Included
features: 12 Watercolour Paints brush Set - 12 vibrant paints included for endless creativity
Comes with a high-quality brush for smooth application
Non-toxic and washable formula - easy cleanup for parents
Perfect for kids, school projects, and DIY crafts
Compact and portable set - great for home or travel use
description: About Anker / Design Group UK Anker / Design Group UK is a leading innovator in creative play, stationery, and gifting products, providing high-quality, affordable, and engaging solutions for all ages. With a strong presence in the global market, the company specializes in designing and manufacturing a diverse range of arts and crafts kits, educational products, and family-friendly activities. Committed to creativity, sustainability, and innovation, Anker / Design Group UK ensures that every product meets rigorous quality standards while reflecting the latest trends in design and functionality. Many of its products are made using FSC® certified materials, promoting responsible sourcing and environmental sustainability. From colouring sets and craft kits to seasonal gifts and classic games, Anker / Design Group UK continues to inspire creativity and bring joy to families worldwide. Whether at home, school, or on the go, their products are designed to spark imagination, learning, and fun for children and adults alike.
